summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackThe Collagen Hydrogel Eye Patch from Mixsoon delivers deep hydration and a radiant glowâ€”perfect for those dealing with sagging skin, fine lines, or loss of elasticity around the eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsIdeal for anyone who finds traditional eye creams too heavy and struggles with tired-looking eyesThese eye patches are effective on dark spots and blemishes when used on the cheeks and foreheadThe spatula included in the packaging helps with easier, more hygienic useKey IngredientsHydrolyzed Collagen - Improves the appearance of fine lines, boosts skin elasticity, and enhanced overall skin hydrationItem 2643841How To UseApply the eye patches on under eye area after cleansing and leave on for 20-30 minutes. Gently pat to aid absorption.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Carrageenan, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Potassium Chloride, Hydroxyacetophenone, Cyamopsis Tetragonoloba (Guar) Gum, Cellulose Gum, Ceratonia Siliqua (Carob) Gum, Allantoin, Propanediol, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Panthenol, Sucrose, Calcium Chloride, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Caprylyl Glycol, Adenosine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Arginine, Disodium EDTA, Hydrolyzed Collagen, Glycine, Glutamic Acid, Aspartic Acid, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Copper Tripeptide-1, Oligopeptide-29, Oligopeptide-32, Lysine, Histidine, Threonine, Serine, Proline, Alanine, Valine, Methionine, Isoleucine, Leucine, Tyrosine, Phenylalanine, Cysteine, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply the eye patches on under eye area after cleansing and leave on for 20-30 minutes. Gently pat to aid absorption.
